abstract: De Blasio administration says number of dropouts in New York City school system dropped 17 percent in 2014-15 school year, along with falling arrests by school safety agents; announces initiative at further reducing numbers.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration announced new and expanded initiatives to change how students are disciplined, following a national shift in techniques.

headline.main: New York City School Suspensions Fell 17% in 2014-15, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: School Suspensions Dropped 17% in 2014-15, the City Says

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration announced new and expanded initiatives to change how students are disciplined, following a national shift in techniques.
